column1: #Text=Fluorinated Ceramer 10 Weight % Fluorinated Ceramer with 1.47 TEOS/Polymer by Weight
#Text=[0132] To 50 g of the 10 Wt. % Fluoroceramer Masterbatch described above, in a 500 ml plastic beaker were added isopropanol (18 ml) and TEOS (17.7 g, 0.085 mol).
#Text=The resulting solution was stirred at room temperature for several minutes, followed by the addition of 0.15 N hydrochloric acid (6.84 ml).
#Text=This solution was then stirred at room temperature for 48 hours, after which Silwet.RTM.
#Text=The resulting solution was stirred for 15 minutes longer before coating or casting.
#Text=[0133] A carbon-filled static-dissipative polycarbonate web substrate from obtained from Gunze (Japan) was used in this example.
